title: Freeze using Win 10 on Virtualbox
author: paoloholzl
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
In some situations during the connection VNC Freeze.
Exiting from the Window and connecting again it work perfectly.

S.O: Local Win10 Pro 21H2, in virtual machine Win10 Home 21H2

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
Can you elaborate what exactly freezes. Is it mRemoteNG or is it only the connection? 
Then I do not understand how you use mRemoteNG in combination with Virtualbox. Is the connection destination running in VB, or are you connecting out of a VM? 
Did the issue also happen also when connecting to another machine? 

And last but not least, what version of mRemoteNG are you using?
